#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int zoo[100001] = { 0 };

void scanint(int &x)
{
	register int c = getchar_unlocked();
	x = 0;
	for (; (c < 48 || c > 57); c = getchar_unlocked())
		;
	for (; c > 47 && c < 58; c = getchar_unlocked())
	{
		x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + c - 48;
	}
}

int main()
{
	int N, Q, K, M, i, x = 1, ans, j;
	char foo[20];

	scanint(N);
	scanint(Q);

	for (i = 1; i <= Q; i++)
	{
		scanf("%s", foo);

		if (!strcmp(foo, "UPDATE"))
		{
			scanint(K);
			scanint(M);

			for (j = 1; K * j <= N; j++)
			{
				zoo[K * j] += M;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			scanint(K);
			printf("%d\n", zoo[K]);
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
